lines.text: You may have the law on your side but we have morality on ours and one day you're going to have to accept that.
You're a racist, and all your men are racists in the same way that Hitler was a racist!
The only ugliness in this world is man's creation, not God's.
God doesn't put anybody down. Just people do.
Does God wants us to be divided, Father?
Jonathan, that's a debate that's gone on for a long time.
Well, I don't think it's a debate in God's eyes.
By not trying to stop it, you become part of it.
